sections.body: This Act may be called the Laws Local Extent Act, 1874.
In this Act the expression 'Scheduled Districts' means the territories mentioned in the sixth schedule hereto annexed.

sections.section_title: Local extent of Acts in first schedule
sections.body: The Acts mentioned in the first schedule hereto annexed are now in force throughout Pakistan, except the Scheduled Districts.

Nothing herein contained shall (a) bar the power of the Federal Government or the Provincial Government, under any law for the time being in force, to extend to any place any Act mentioned in the said first schedule; (b) extend any Act empowering the Provincial Government to extend the same or any part thereof, or affect in any manner the exercise of such power; (c) affect the operation of any Act or Regulation heretofore extended to or declared to be in force in any of the Scheduled Districts; (d) revive any enactment which has been repealed either generally or with reference to some special subject; (k) affect the operation of any enactment not mentioned in any of the schedules hereto annexed.
Rep. by the Repealing Act, 1876 (XII of 1876).

ACTS OF THE SUPREME COUNCIL Year and Number Subject 1839, XXXII .. Interest. 1841, X .. Registration of Ships. 1850, XI .. Navigation laws. 1850, XII .. Default of Public accountants. 1850, XVIII .. Protection of Judicial Officers. 1850, XXI .. Non-forfeiture of rights by loss of caste. 1855,XI .. Mesne profits and improvements. 1855, XII .. Executors and Administrators. 1855, XIII .. Compensation for loss occasioned by death caused by actionable wrong. 1856, IX .. Bills of lading. 1856, XV .. Marriage of Hindu Widows. 1860, XXI .. Registration of Societies. 1863, XVI .. Excise Duty payable on Spirits used in Arts and Manufactures. 1865, III .. Common Carries.
[(a) Madras Regulations and (b) Acts of the Supreme Council relating to the Madras Presidency.] Omitted by A.O., 1949, Schedule.
[(a) Bombay Regulations and (b) Acts of the Supreme Council relating to the Bombay Presidency.] Omitted by A.O., 1949, Schedule.

[(a) Bengal Regulations Lower Provinces and (b) Acts of the Supreme Council relating to the Lower Provinces.] Omitted by the Federal Laws (Revision and Declaration) Ordinance, 1981 (XXVII of 1981), s. 3 and IInd Sch.
[(a) Bengal Regulations (North-Western Provinces) and (b) Acts of the Supreme Council relating to the North-Western Provinces.] Omitted by A.O., 1949., Schedule.

PART I SCHEDULED DISTRICTS The Punjab The District of Dera Ghazi Khan PART II SCHEDULED DISTRICTS, The North West Frontier Province, The Districts of Hazara, Peshawar, Kohat, Bannu and Dera Ismail Khan. PART III SCHEDULED DISTRICTS SINDH. The Whole of Sindh.
